summary: A new Valkyrie race using the Nord Race template
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod. I used the appearance of Nords. Removed the smithing bonus adds it to one handed weapons. Removed all Nord abilities. Added 100% poison and disease resistance. Added 30% magic and damage resistance. May add 100% magic and damage resistance in the future to represent Immortality...but well...you know how some people are.
The Armor is called Thunderbird it normally comes in black by ken1945.
The Golden Armor is a retex by Pablo11
The Hair is by um....I don't remember...sorry.

I hope you like it. I take no credit at all. So many Master modders are involved I couldn't name them all. Please feel free to enhance change or recreate in any way you wish and forgive me for not giving credit to more people or the right people.

Contains Race only armor and hair not included.
author: AlluraValiant
